Sliding window with monotonic deque to find min/max in subarrays
problem_summary_simple: Calculate the sum of minimum and maximum elements across all subarrays of size at most k.
problem_summary_technical: Uses sliding window and monotonic deques to efficiently find min/max in subarrays of size up to k.
key_insights: The core idea is to efficiently find the minimum and maximum element within a sliding window.
Monotonic deques (increasing for min, decreasing for max) are crucial for O(1) min/max retrieval.
The problem requires summing these min/max values for all valid subarrays.
